TopicTitle: Kethane Pack 0.9.2 - New cinematic trailer! - 1.0 compatibility update

Articles.Content: woot keep this alive~!
This has to be my favorite mod for KSP.
I used the Third party fix here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30591-So-What-Mods-broke-on-20-%28incomplete-list-here-fixes%29. It seems to work.

I used the Third party fix here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30591-So-What-Mods-broke-on-20-%28incomplete-list-here-fixes%29. It seems to work.

Not for me it doesn't. I can't launch anything or quit things that are already launched. I'm putting the DLL in KSP/Plugins, where the other one was. Is that right?

I used the Third party fix here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30591-So-What-Mods-broke-on-20-%28incomplete-list-here-fixes%29. It seems to work.

It doesn't seem to work for me.

I put it in a simulated .20 mod, based on mechjeb 2.0.8

so the DLL file is in GameData/kethane(made up name)/plugins/MMI_Kethane.dll

then I took the original mod and placed the folders like such:

Parts: GameData/kethane/Parts

PluginData: GameData/kethane/plugins/PluginData

Plugins: N/A (replaced by fix)

Resources: GameData/kethane/Resources

then I did the PART{} thing on the config file (for those who don't know you now need to wrap each part config file in PART{ and } for it to work)

thus far nothing crashed or seemed to break, and I saw the parts seemingly normally in the VAB so it's probably working, I haven't actually scanned for kethane yet though so that's still uncertain
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21650546/Kethane.rar Here's what I have in my GameData folder, just drop it in there and see if it works.

Hi guys,

Those fixes worked wonders guys

I downloaded Spike's pack and plopped it in my game data folder and it is all good... now I also got my head around the new structure too with that example.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21650546/Kethane.rar Here's what I have in my GameData folder, just drop it in there and see if it works.

So again for everyone, 0.20 fix for Kethane

Put/unzip this to your KSP_win/GameData and you should have your Kethane back and working.

Only thing i cant seem to get working is the detection sound, but alas that aint a biggie.

Currently in progress mapping new mun mining spots out, and positioning my mining stuff in 0.20

Started from scratch again

Thanks for the fix, KSP without my kethana fix, is just feels not right

BRILLIANT! thanks so much fellas!!

An official update would be nice (ive been waiting for 1.0 since I read the bit about pipelines n such) but this little fix yall made will do just fine till then.

It was getting bad....

I caught Jeb and Bill pouring green paint into a rocket tank last night...muttering 'it will work the same, it has to"
I dont allow Bill and Jeb to work togeather anymore.
Is it possible to scan for kethane when not in direct control of the satellite with the kethane scanner? If so, how do I do it?

Yes and no. Mostly no, lol

But yes if you have mechjeb 2.0* within what is it, 2.5km? And if you have lazor systems installed and physics load distance set higher you should be able to go up to 90km away from your probe with it still active. I am not 100.00% positive on this, it was just something I noticed when launching one of two satellites then moving away from it while it was still active and I had the map open on the local satellite.

Haven't texted extensively, but that's part of the plan today (tho to be fair it wouldn't do any good, since mechjeb drops its multi-ship control if you enter timewarp, so you'd have to do it in real time)
Thanks for the help.

People! Beware! I just lost all my Kethane maps, as I put my old ones maps into GameData\Kethane\Plugins\PluginData\MMI_Kethane... restarted KSP... *poof* all maps blank.

And me being the idiot I am, used my only copy. So, if you do this, don't be an idiot like me, make sure you make backups!

Would like to say though, I can successfully place the part on a craft, and activate the detector.

Edited May 24, 2013 by tek_604
Confirmation that unoffical patch works
Well I started new game, so that shouldnt be issue for me. And I thought that you cannot copy maps because they are different for each save game, that they are generated for each one.
I started a new game as well since the 0.20 update. Guess I'll start working on a new fuel depot station till kethane is 'officially' updated. Can't wait though!
no workie here. all parts show up but putting sensor on a normaly working rocket it will not load.

So again for everyone, 0.20 fix for Kethane

Put/unzip this to your KSP_win/GameData and you should have your Kethane back and working.

So it should be "KSP_win/GameData/kethane/[parts, plugins and resources]" or just "KSP_win/GameData/[parts, plugins and resources]" I'm assuming nothing goes into the "KSP_win/GameData/Squad" directory

Sorry for the noob question, I cannot into computers all that well
The inflatable habitat causes all my parts to go missing and every ship I have to not load.

So it should be "KSP_win/GameData/kethane/[parts, plugins and resources]" or just "KSP_win/GameData/[parts, plugins and resources]" I'm assuming nothing goes into the "KSP_win/GameData/Squad" directory

Sorry for the noob question, I cannot into computers all that well

New folder system in 0.20 works taht way, so yes, you put it to Game data, all of it, so you will have ksp/gamedata/kethane/parts,plugin,resources, etc... (separate folders)

Folder Squad is only for stock parts. plugins for .20 are put just simply here in game data, no need for copying each folder as before.

My GameData folder:

And when I double-click Kethane folder there:

I hope it's clear. You can also notice that I have more mods, all just put there. (there are exeptions tho)

Edited May 24, 2013 by elkar

Only thing i cant seem to get working is the detection sound, but alas that aint a biggie.

I got the sounds to work by putting them in the original location (...\Kerbal Space Program\PluginData\MMI_Kethane\sounds) where "echo_deposit.wav" and "echo_empty.wav" are the only files within the directory. All other "PluginData" files should go into "...Kerbal Space Program\Plugins\PluginData\".

EDIT: This post is outdated. In context, it pertained to getting sounds from Kethane Mod Pack 0.4.3 to work with KSP 0.20.

Edited June 14, 2013 by Psychobutt
On the next update on this mod can you make a kethane flag?

Awesome work on that fix, sorted my Kethane out beautifully.

I was wondering tho, does Kethane work with the KAS mod? is the winch lines able to transfer Kethane (i know it works with regular fuel)
